meanings.definition: A person who has earned a letter in a particular sport or activity.
meanings.sent1: The lettermen proudly displayed their awards on their jackets.
meanings.sent2: The school honored the lettermen at the end-of-year ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The lettermen joked about starting a club for letter collectors.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, lettermen are like walking trophies.
meanings.sent5: Becoming one of the lettermen was the highlight of his high school years.
